Package ru.nsu.fit.tsukanov.recordBook.core

Class RecordBook

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.tsukanov.recordBook.core.RecordBook
public class RecordBook extends Object
Record book contains id, student and semesters. And has functions for checking Scholarship and color of diploma.
See Also:
Student, Semester, Subject

    • addSemester

      public boolean addSemester​(Semester semester)
      Add the semester to the list of semesters. If there is no semester with current number, then specified semester will be added.
      Parameters:
      semester - the semester that will be added into list of semesters
      Returns:
      true if semester was added

    • addSemesters

      public void addSemesters​(Collection<Semester> inputSemesters)
      Parameters:

      public long getQualifyingMark()

    • setQualifyingMark

      public void setQualifyingMark​(long qualifyingMark)
      Set the mark for qualify work. 0 - None. 2-5 - common mark.
      Parameters:
      qualifyingMark - the mark of qualify work.

    • hasHighScholarship

      public boolean hasHighScholarship()
      Check fo higher Scholarship. If there is no bad mark (less than 4), it would be higher scholarship.
      Returns:
      true if it would be higher scholarship

    • hasRedDiploma

      public boolean hasRedDiploma()
      Check for color of diploma (very useful). If there is no bad mark (less than 4), and 75% of marks are five, and qualifying work mark is five, it would be red Diploma.
      Returns:
      true if it would be red Diploma

    • getAverage

      public double getAverage()
      Calculates average mark from all semesters.
      Returns:
      average mark from all semesters

    • getMarks

      public List<Long> getMarks()
      Return all marks (without pass or fail).
      Returns:
      list of marks
